dmca.title: [ABUSE] hosting an illegal site
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Monday, April 10, 2006 5:02 PM
To: ruthmeri.gleason@mse-ta.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] hosting an illegal site]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] hosting an illegal site
Date:         Mon, 10 Apr 2006 13:03:43 -0600
From:         Ruthmeri Gleason - MSE Proposal Manager/Coordinator
<ruthmeri.gleason@mse-ta.com>
To:         <legal-response@theplanet.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>



Hello. Currently, you are hosting a site that is stealing my company's web
site and trying to sell ads from it. The site you are hosting is
http://www.fsmse.com/ . The people who say they own this site are actually
stealing the form and contents from my company's www.mse-ta.com
<http://www.mse-ta.com> site. They are trying to get other companies to post
adverts and pay them the money. One such agency, adtegrity, researched their
request and found the site to be false and did not accept the site. However,
it looks like Yahoo is allowing ads to be posted. This fsmse.com site is
illegally representing themselves as MSE.

Please let me know what I can do to get you to shut these people down! I
would like to maintain the integrity of both theplanet and MSE.

So far, I have been able to get only the information below - (bogus I am
sure). Please let me know that you can stop this illegal activity. Thank you

Prefix: Mr.

First Name: Joan

Last Name: Nixon

Title: Welcome to MSE

Company: MSE Technology Applications Inc.

Address 1: 3824 Kingston St.
Address 2:

City: Reno

State/Province: NJ

Zip/Postal Code: 89502

Country: United States

Phone: 702-586-1018

Fax: 702-586-1018

Email: admin@fsmse.com

These people are misrepresenting themselves as MSE and they are not!.
They are using my company and your company to illegally gain money.  If
there is anything I can do to help or if you can help stop these people,
please let me know.

Thanks

_______________________

/*Ruthmeri (Mary) Gleason*//  | /Proposal Manager/Coordinator | MSE
Technology Applications Inc. |
| 406.494.7354 | www.mse-ta.com <http://www.mse-ta.com/> |
www.tetragenics.com <http://www.tetragenics.com/> |


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEOtXyvK/XpJs6oyURAvYuAKCDtkOcTs2u31rbocjIfehAklXVtwCfWSBP

=Z2Je
